short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refines Mapy.cz interface and adds useful features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• GPX file drop to blue overlay, still allowing to use planner
• Keyboard shortcuts for switching map types
• Condensed sidebar to fit more content
• Condensed map controls
• Hidden paid POIs
• and more…
